page.title: 12E.ALLINGTON(SPECIAL SC.CONT)
page.content: The house where the boys live is comfortable and well furnished.In the sitting-rooms the boys can watch T.V or listen to records or radio.There is a large games-room where they can enjoy table-tennis,snooker and darts.A disco is held every other Saturday night.The school also has it's own coach for out-side activities i.e.Canoeing,rock-climbing fishing etc.The grounds are well set out with facilities for foot-ball,riding.There is a swimming-pool and eight acres of gardens and orchards.All the boys help in the garden and some have their own individual gardens to cultivate.
